text_block_list.text: Several days after the Selection Race. There was a question that had been on my mind the whole time. ……maybe that's why I found myself heading to that river bank again.
I saw Yaeno Muteki here the day before the race, but the Yaeno Muteki I saw the day of the race――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……！ You are――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……in the spectator seats at the Selection Race, I saw that you happened to be there. While it's a bit late, thank you for taking the trouble to attend.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: However…… even though you took the trouble to come see me, I showed you such a disappointing run…… I am ashamed……
choice_data_list: ……you were completely different during the race
……you were completely different during the race

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …………you have a very discerning eye, it seems.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: If I had to answer that question, then the real me―― was most likely the one you saw during the race.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Unable to control that 『Ardent Flame』 within myself, letting it rage while running…… that immaturity, is my foundation.

text_block_list.name: Young Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Shut up, shut up！ Because…… because it pisses me off！！ It makes me sick！！ Just like that, my vision turns red……！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……when I was young, I often behaved violently, letting my emotions and desires run wild like a beast. Solving everything I didn't like using power, like some kind of brigand.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Without knowing what I should do, being controlled by my inner furor, injuring those around me, ignoring others……

text_block_list.name: Young Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: It's fine, I'll just beat everyone！！ All those weaklings, beating all of them, and then…… alone by myself……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: 『Weaklings』 is it? Hmmm. ……if that is the case, then as long as I am here, you shall never be alone.

text_block_list.name: Young Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Ah…… G-…… Grandpa……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: Come along, it's long past time you came to the dojo, Yaeno. ……it's time to train with Grandpa.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: For that exceedingly immature me, the one who persistently imparted upon me―― was the head of the 『Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu』, my grandfather.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: My grandfather said this. That inner fury―― if you continue to allow this 『Ardent Flame』 to rage, you will naturally continue to suffer the consequences.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Channel this in to the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu 『Kata』, in order to temper that wild tendency. By doing this, you may eventually reach the state of 『Tranquil Water』.
choice_data_list: And were you able to calm down？
And were you able to calm down？

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Yes. Due to the days of training with my exemplary grandfather, even if just a little, I've learned to keep myself in check, and obtained some measure of harmony.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: However, even this 『Tranquil Water』, was unable to quell the 『Ardent Flame』 within me……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Perhaps fearing I would once again fall in to madness and injure another, one day, my grandfather inquired of me―

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
text_block_list.text: On that path, without bringing harm to others, rather reveling jointly in contention. On that path, this fury becomes a ray of light. ――What would that path be？

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……I shall ask this of you as well. The answer to my grandfather's question, would you happen to know？
……there was one thing that came to mind. Something where the goal is not to injure, but to compete and enjoy oneself. That's――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ――As I thought, you're quite discerning.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Coming to know of races, granted me some measure of contentment as I had found my path.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Using martial arts to temper this fury, harnessing this fury during races. These violent emotions within me now had an outlet, they could be channeled――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: And thus…… I realized. On this path, if I could obtain splendid results, I could take pride in myself…… and properly repay him.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Even if I'm immature…… even though I've done nothing but cause my grandfather trouble, and worry. That I could still show him that I can hold my chest out in pride……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: However……――！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Even on this path！ Even in the race, I've been made aware that I can still be overcome by these emotions……！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I need to be straightened out！ These overflowing emotions, continue to disturb the immature 『Ardent Flame』 within me！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: If I… can't handle at least that much…… if I continue staying this immature, no matter how long passes…… I won't be able to repay him……！！

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I need to continue training…… My training, was insufficient……
Being unable to control herself, while carrying that anguish―― Even with that, Yaeno Muteki was earnestly trying to overcome this hurdle.
While standing there in front of her, these words naturally came out―
choice_data_list: Will you let me help you？
Will you let me help you？

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Eh――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …………for what reason？ From the perspective of a trainer, my current self is nothing but an illーtempered Uma Musume, there is no merit in being concerned with me.
choice_data_list: Merit has nothing to do with this

text_block_list.text: To show her that that was not the reason―― I continued to look straight in to her eyes.
choice_data_list: I want to cheer you on
I want to cheer you on

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …………you're quite sincere, aren't you? Your words, and those eyes…… so straight-forward, as if you believe you can't be mistaken.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……truthfully, I'm fully aware that I'm at a complete loss. That's why…… I would also like to request your help.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: In order to help me find a way to control this 『Ardent Flame』…… would I be able to request your assistance?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……you have my gratitude.
Yaeno Muteki has a large hurdle in front of her. A way to overcome it…… from now on, together with her, we'd try to find a way!
